channel.title: Which slogan should I choose for my site?
channel.description: Yeah.. I don't know which to decide, so I'll let you guys help me, k? Kk, ty.

item.title: Which slogan should I choose for my site?
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:103, topic:7111”][quote author=XxKanexX link=topic=9898.msg122991#msg122991 date=1154687677]

it was just a mild insult i dont actually mean HE HAS NO LIFE. I do understand that you take it that way though as i did say it.

i also have more posts than rabcarl

News Flash: POST COUNT DOSN’T MATTER. If anything, The more posts you have, the more you spam.

[/quote]

You would know all about that Kane, wouldn’t you?

Anyways, if anyone accuses me of having no life, there dam right, but I am growing one out in my back garden. :P[/quote]
I don’t have many posts here so shush you

I’m not gonna’ bother reading Xerxes’s post lol, What a waste of time. He just repeats himself. Yawn

Read full topic
item.source: Which slogan should I choose for my site?

item.title: Which slogan should I choose for my site?
item.dc:creator: @NOURLOL NOURLOL
item.description:
@NOURLOL wrote:

Hello.
I think that some people worry too much about their status in communities.
You should only be concerned with the quality of your own contributions, and helping people in need.
I think some people are actively seeking out and trying to degrade others, and I think this is wrong. If you feel that someone is degrading the quality of the forum, you should message an administrator and not create fights where people will take sides and defend each other, spread stupid insults and attacks. Just ignore the offending posts, because you will not improve anything by posting negatively. There is a “report post” button, and your own ability to ignore; an unbumped and poorly made post will quickly dissapear.

Read full topic

item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

My god Josh get’s angry at the internet fast, rofl.

Ah this is quite funny, Watching you all try to insult me. I’m not even going to bother replying.
Xerxes got banned, what does that tell you? That having the last word is normally the worst thing to do.

He should have left it like i did along time ago.
And James, stop making accusations that people have no lives when you don’t even know them.

item.description:

[quote=“sdouble, post:96, topic:7111”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=9898.msg119952#msg119952 date=1154616451]
Your also a sdouble wannabe, in my eyes, you see sdouble and Xerxes as cool so you act like a wannabe trying to act cool, but still end up lame.
[/quote]

Is there something wrong with being an sdouble wannabe? And why would someone want to be like him anyway?[/quote]

Nothing’s wrong with you sdouble, it’s just he’s acted like you and Xerxes and admitted he’s a wannabe, just wannabe’s are lame, not the person they want to be, of course.

item.title: Which slogan should I choose for my site?
item.dc:creator: @rabcarl rabcarl
item.description:
@rabcarl wrote:

[quote=“james, post:64, topic:7111”]kane. The only time i have seen you on these forums is straight after SRL went down. Now its back up go back there?

and un-named starblaster MADE A SCRIPT im talking about the people that use them.

Aryan was a far better bot even if it was leech infested.

ALSO you are also contradicting yourself as to saying iam a little fag

which is in turn breaking rule.4

be quiet right now[/quote]
Noob, there are other forums besides this and SRL. You just haven’t been to them, because you’re too “new” and are therefore qualified as a “newbie”

Read full topic
item.source: Which slogan should I choose for my site?

item.title: Which slogan should I choose for my site?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“james, post:64, topic:7111”]kane. The only time i have seen you on these forums is straight after SRL went down. Now its back up go back there?

and un-named starblaster MADE A SCRIPT im talking about the people that use them.

Aryan was a far better bot even if it was leech infested.

ALSO you are also contradicting yourself as to saying iam a little fag

which is in turn breaking rule.4

be quiet right now[/quote]

Who gives a fuck if I break the rules or not? I NEVER said I read the rules, you said YOU read the rules and continue to break them, for all you know I could be a strange forienger that can’t speak english.

When you run a script, you are bound to get somthing out of this, I’ll take StarBlaster’s StressMiner, you run it, you get essence. You sell the essence and gradually get millions from this, you sell the millions and get real life money.

No one is saying SCAR is better than Aryan. NO ONE. I’m 100% sure you brought Aryan into this topic just to prove how SCAR is crap, yet why did Aryan get so detectable? Hmm? Oh I’m sure if you ask Fawki about his accounts, you’ll see levels made and probally never will beable to gain by Aryan unless in it’s very early days. Yes, it was possible but take the ban rate, SCAR > Aryan, I’m sure it’ll stay like this for another year.

james:

im proud to say that im a xerxes wannabe

Your also a sdouble wannabe, in my eyes, you see sdouble and Xerxes as cool so you act like a wannabe trying to act cool, but still end up lame.

james:

when people start to assume with no evidence that they have no real life friends it is clear that they are an idiot

Xerxes is PRESUMING XxKanexX is an emo, and has no friends(Atleast I think, I’m sure Xerxes would confirm this as true), so you should be punished little boy! Your master is very cross at you! :mad:

james:

yes it most definitly is him

Get a mod to confirm if the IP has changed between Josh and XxKanexX then, and stop PRESUMING it’s XxKanexX!

Read full topic

item.title: Which slogan should I choose for my site?
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Insulting people doesn't make you superior. Insulting people doesn't make you superior. Insulting people doesn't make you superior. Insulting people doesn't make you superior.

All you have achieved coming here is starting a flame war, gg. A better course of action would probably be; leave, go do something remotely respectable or useful, and come back, maybe people will have a reason to listen to your shit.

/spit


First off, I think you need to get a life when you start spitting virtually over the internet.

About the insulting and superior thing: I guess you’d know alot about that topic. You’re the one who always insults people, spams everywhere and tells people to go die.

I think you need to get your facts straight before attempting to post.

This is my last post, I’m not going to bother replying anymore. You may have the time to sit around, staring at the computer screen, waiting to try and fight me. But i actually have a life. Tootles.

Read full topic

item.title: Which slogan should I choose for my site?
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“Xerxes, post:78, topic:7111”][quote author=XxKanexX link=topic=9898.msg119479#msg119479 date=1154606649]

See other thread; your posts mean nothing, so how are we supposed to make anything of them?
/golfclap

I understand that you can’t take in my big fancy words i use. s-o-r-r-y.

And again, Xerxes follows you, your only supporter and helper. Funny, ey?
[/quote]

[/quote]
I’ve never seen what you look like, I think you need to see a doctor. That dosn’t look healthy, Xerxes.

And why do you have a Linkin park poster in your room?

When i say “friends” i mean “real life friends”. You know? The things you don’t have but want, Josh?
Internet friends are just pathetic.

And wow, 3 gang bangers against me now, i see a bright and happy future ahead.
No-one needs to tell him to leave for him to go outside and live life.

Read full topic

item.title: Which slogan should I choose for my site?
item.dc:creator: @stopbanningme stopbanningme
item.description:
@stopbanningme wrote:

Definitions of idiot on the Web: * a person of subnormal intelligence
Definitions of retard on the Web: * idiot: a person of subnormal intelligence
I think you're getting your tryhard correct grammar confused with actual intelligence, go back and read what people have said to you, and then do it again, again, again, again ...

I’m increased of opinion that you’re a opressed little child (/me remembers photo of said child) searching for something to excersise his ego.

Insulting people doesn’t make you superior. Insulting people doesn’t make you superior. Insulting people doesn’t make you superior. Insulting people doesn’t make you superior.

All you have achieved coming here is starting a flame war, gg. A better course of action would probably be; leave, go do something remotely respectable or useful, and come back, maybe people will have a reason to listen to your shit.

/spit

Read full topic
